h2_title: Black Wind Mountain’s Secret - Ringing the Second Bell
content: Look for a way forward beyond a small archway to the side of the boss arena, and climb the winding stairs to follow a trail of gold leading to the next Shrine.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Bamboo_Grove_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Bamboo Grove Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Black Wind Mountain’s Secret - Ringing the Second Bell'.
The content is as follows:
Look for a way forward beyond a small archway to the side of the boss arena, and climb the winding stairs to follow a trail of gold leading to the next Shrine.
